biotools.summary: ExoLocator is a database of protein coding exons from completed vertebrate genomes in Ensembl. Exons are organized into alignments of ortologous and paralogous sequences, and when an exon appears to be missing form a species, we look for it using our own hardware accelerated version of Smith-Waterman algorithm.

bioschemas.name: ExoLocator
